job.title: Data Scientist 2
job.description: Digital Health and Analytics within Humana is dedicated to transform members' health experience and Humana's services using technology and analytics. We are looking for a Data Scientist 2 who will design studies and utilize cutting-edge predictive modeling techniques, test rigorous hypotheses, and turn data and insights into actionable plans. Being part of talented team of data scientists with broad skills and applications, the Data Scientist 2 will work cross-functionally and collaboratively with teams across the enterprise through innovative R&D, machine learning, and cutting-edge platforms. The scope of our work includes forecasting, predictive modeling, designing business experiments, and ROI studies. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience on healthcare data, demonstrated innovative and creative methods for overcoming testing constraints, as well as successfully applying machine learning techniques to address business needs. Responsibilities Additional Information This position is based on either Humana's headquarters in Louisville-KY or Humana's Studio-H in Boston-MA, or remote in the 48 continental states. Scheduled Weekly Hours 40
